text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @FoxNews 36 million Americans filed for unemployment by May.

2.8 million Americans got rehired after lifting the quarantine.

You still owe me 33.2 million jobs!

Pray, people, tell me Trump understands that!

https://t.co/BAE4xal0sx
